nostr-client.syncMetadata.title: Synchronize Account Metadata
nostrClient.bootstrapRelays.markdownDesc:
Relay URLs to get metadata (your profile, relays to use etc...) of your account.  Set your daily-use relays here.

 Hint: After changing it, you should run `Nostr: Synchronize Account Metadata` in order to keep metadata up-to-date.
nostrClient.additionalWriteRelays.markdo: Relay URLs to additionally send your posts.  Write relays configured by events (kind 3 & 10002) are also used.
nostrClient.defaultUserStatus.markdownDe: User status text that will be set by the command `Nostr: Set Default User Status`.
Link URL for user status that will be set by the command `Nostr: Set Default User Status`.
